Is there a way how to call `readline` on a `pipe` with a timeout?
```@sync begin
        @async begin
            println("Starting to read")
            yield()
            a  = ""
            while process_running(process[4])
                print(".")
                a = readline(outpipe)                #here I'd like to guard with a timeout
                if occursin("END_OF_TRACE", a)
                    break
                else
                    push!(results, a)
                end
            end
            println("Stoped reading")
        end
    end```
